issue.title: [R] [Doc] Document changes in the _Writing bindings_ documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16891](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16891). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- going forward we should be using `pkg::fun`  when defining a binding, which will register 2 copies of the same binding.
